ExceptionReporter(com.google.android.gms.FullName: public ExceptionReporter (Tracker tracker, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler originalHandler, Context context)

uncaughtException(java.lang.Thread, java.FullName: public void uncaughtException (Thread t, Throwable e)

ClassDesc: Used to catch any uncaught exceptions and report them to Google Analytics. This class will call @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#GoogleAnalytics#dispatchLocalHits_E@ after calling @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#Tracker#send_E@. The exact message reported is determined by the @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ExceptionParser_E@ set via the @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ExceptionReporter#setExceptionParser_E@ method. See @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#StandardExceptionParser_E@ for an example of an implementation of @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#ExceptionParser_E@. All exceptions reported via this class will be reported as fatal exceptions. Usage:
